content: H Question: Hi, i just taken the pratice asvab test on military.com and wanted to see my score in percentile. I want to join the air force and the current percentile to be accepted is 50. Here are my scores in the required field. General Science-68% Arithmetic Reasoning-53.3% Word Knowledge-77.1 Paragraph Comprehension-93.3% Auto & Shop Information-44% Mathematics Knowledge-56% Mechanical Comprehension-44% Electronics Information-45% These are the % correct. Please tell me what my score would be out of 99. Thank you so much Choices: I need the answer Please tell me the answer

title: Scoring The ASVAB
